CONFIGURE - Enum constant in enum class driver_framework.request.Request
 
CONFIGURE_N - Enum constant in enum class driver_framework.response.Response
Request = | CONFIGURE | sensor_id | sample rate ( 4 bytes ) Response = | CONNECT_N | sensor_id
CONFIGURE_Y - Enum constant in enum class driver_framework.response.Response
Request = | CONFIGURE | sensor_id | sample rate ( 4 bytes ) Response = | CONNECT_Y | - - - - |
configureSensor(int, int) - Method in class driver_framework.response.DataProviderThread
 
CONNECT - Enum constant in enum class driver_framework.request.Request
 
CONNECT_N - Enum constant in enum class driver_framework.response.Response
Request = | CONNECT | - - - - | Response = | CONNECT_N | - - - - | problem with establishing communication
CONNECT_SENSOR - Enum constant in enum class driver_framework.request.Request
 
CONNECT_SENSOR_N - Enum constant in enum class driver_framework.response.Response
Request = | CONNECT_SENSOR | SENSOR_TYPE(1 byte) | this response is given if Sensor_type is not registered / present on the board.
CONNECT_SENSOR_Y - Enum constant in enum class driver_framework.response.Response
Request = | CONNECT_SENSOR | SENSOR_TYPE(1 byte) - - - | this response is given if Sensor_type is registered / present on the board.
CONNECT_Y - Enum constant in enum class driver_framework.response.Response
Request = | CONNECT | - - - - | Response = | CONNECT_Y | n sensors | (sensorPackage - id + sensor type)
connectViaBluetooth() - Method in class arduino_simulator.ArduinoSimulator
 
connectViaBluetooth() - Method in interface arduino_simulator.ArduinoSimulatorInterface
imitates connecting to a bluetooth remote hardware device delay is necessary when this happens alongside with establishing the communication
